page.title: 14INDUSTRY
page.content: In 1898 the Victoria pleasure gardens were opened in Burgess Hill. These were on the Western side of the town and after draining and clearing provided the site for the new { {industrial estate. At the last count there were 58 {factories,}employing over a thousand people. Many of these travel in from nearby towns and villages. They{manufacture}a variety of products - perfume, clothes, computer components, specialised parts for custom-built vehicles and costume jewellery. There are also a number of large { {offices and warehouses,}some of which are situated towards the centre of the town. New factories and offices continue to be built in and around Burgess Hill,encroaching into the countryside.
